title: President Trump is Confronting our Nation’s Broken Healthcare System – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Healthcare	

Issued on:
February 28, 2017
DESPERATE NEED FOR REPEAL AND REPLACE: The United States’ healthcare system is trending in a disastrous direction and desperately needs improvement.BEGINNING TO FIX OUR HEALTHCARE SYSTEM: President Donald J. Trump is lifting the financial burdens of Obamacare that impact so many Americans.
